thread.title: Avon Names New CEO as Activist Investors Lose Patience

author: Cara Lombardo
title: Avon Names New CEO as Activist Investors Lose Patience
text:
Avon Products Inc. has hired a Unilever PLC veteran as its chief executive, six months after the cosmetic giant decided to search for a new leader following a disappointing five-year tenure that left investors exasperated.
Jan Zijderveld, whose new job is effective immediately, was most recently president of Unilever’s European unit, which is the consumer-goods company’s largest with 25,000 employees in 34 countries.
